summary: Frontend testing completed successfully for ServiceManager app. All requested multi-select features verified on Customers, Products, and Invoicing pages. Route planner single-route mode working correctly with clear route functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: Multi-select implementation is consistent across all three pages (Customers, Products, Invoicing)
All pages use proper data-testid attributes for testing
Route planner correctly uses local state (currentRoute) instead of database history
Print travel note includes all technical measurement fields as requested
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 1072 customers, 21 products, 50 work orders
context_for_next_testing_agent: All multi-select features working. Route planner shows only one active route at a time. Print travel note includes technical measurement fields (Høyt nivå, PH, Uttap, Temp, Strømbr, PO4, Siste test, Dosm.pr.syk, Maksprog, Turb>20?, Alarmer, SV30, Sl.nivå%, AT/KT/KM) and Deler table.

customers_page.import_excel_button: PASS - Visible and clickable with data-testid='import-customers-button'
customers_page.select_all_checkbox: PASS - Works correctly, shows '1072 valgt' when selected
customers_page.delete_selected_button: PASS - Appears when items selected, shows 'Slett valgte (1072)'

products_page.select_all_checkbox: PASS - Works correctly, shows '21 valgt' when selected
products_page.delete_selected_button: PASS - Appears when items selected, shows 'Slett valgte (21)'

invoicing_page.select_all_checkbox: PASS - Works correctly with 'Velg alle' button
invoicing_page.delete_selected_button: PASS - Appears when items selected, shows 'Slett valgte (50)'

route_planner.single_route_mode: PASS - Only shows currentRoute state, not database history
route_planner.no_route_message: PASS - Shows 'Ingen aktiv rute' when no route exists
route_planner.route_display: PASS - Shows customer names, addresses, numbered stops
route_planner.clear_route_button: PASS - 'Fjern rute' button removes current route
route_planner.modal_note: PASS - Shows 'NB: Kun én rute vises om gangen. Skriv ut før du genererer en ny.'
